G

Generation - Class in Unnamed Package
The Generation class represents a row of cells in a 2-State Cellular Automaton.
Generation(boolean...) - Constructor for class Generation
Creates a Generation with the given states.
Generation(String, char) - Constructor for class Generation
Creates a Generation with a given String of states, along with a trueSymbol, to convert it into a boolean[] of cellStates.
getCurrentGeneration() - Method in class Automaton
This will return the latest generation.
getGeneration(int) - Method in class Automaton
This method returns the generation at the given step number.
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Method in class ElementaryRule
getNeighborhood will return a boolean[] with the index, along with one element to its left and right.
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Method in class Rule
Gives the neighborhood of the generation around the given index.
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Method in class TotalisticRule
Gives the neighborhood of the generation around the given index.
getNeighborhoodByRadius(int, int, Generation) - Static method in class Rule
Gets the surrounding cells around the index in a Generation, going to the left and right as far as the radius tells.
getRuleNum() - Method in class Automaton
This will get the rule Number of the Automaton.
getRuleNum() - Method in class Rule
Gives the rule number passed to the constructor.
getState(int) - Method in class Generation
Returns the state of an index in the generation.
getStates() - Method in class Generation
Returns the states of the generation.
getStates(char, char) - Method in class Generation
Returns the states of the generation, but translates the boolean values into the given falseSymbol and trueSymbol.
getTotalSteps() - Method in class Automaton
Gives the total number of evolutions made in the automaton.
